scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js  -f cjs index.js --dir ./dist --chunkFileNames i18n-[name]-[hash].cjs.js --entryFileNames i18n-[name].cjs.js --experimentalCodeSplitting
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js  -f es index.js --dir ./dist --chunkFileNames i18n-[name]-[hash].es.js --entryFileNames i18n-[name].es.js --experimentalCodeSplitting
